metadata.section_title: Refusal of indefinite leave to remain as the family member of a stateless person

chunks.text:
### Refusal of indefinite leave to remain as the family member of a stateless person

1.   416. DELETED.

1.   417. Applications made on or before 10 November 2025 for permission as a partner or child of a stateless person will be decided under the Part 14 rules in force at that time. Applications on or after 11 November 2025 will be decided under Appendix Statelessness rules, if the applicant meets its requirements. If not, the applicant must apply for permission under Appendix FM.

1.   418. DELETED.

Print this page
chunks.summary: This provision applies to family members applying for indefinite leave to remain as the partner or child of a stateless person. Applications made on or after 11 November 2025 must meet the requirements of the Appendix Statelessness rules; if not, they must apply under Appendix FM. Applications made before this date are decided under existing rules in force at that time.
